page.title: 18KINGSTON PK.&AIRPORT IND.EST
page.content: In the North-West of our block lies several new private housing estates which make up{Kingston Park Estate. Much farmland has disappeared in the last 10 years with extensions to this estate.Only 1 field now separates this estate from the large council estate of Newbiggin Hall. Close to Kingston Park Estate is the{ {Airport Industrial Estate}named after Newcastle Airport which is 2.5 miles away. Originally this estate was composed of large{distribution plants such as those for Newcastle Breweries and Northern Gas.Subsequently,many more service industries have been established in{small factory units. Several units are sub-divided into smaller units for one-man businesses. Although some units remain vacant,the estate is still expanding.
